label: Adhesives and Tapes
description: Products used for bonding and attaching materials together.

subcategories.label: Double-Sided Tape
subcategories.description: Tape with adhesive on both sides used for bonding materials together.

subcategories.label: Packaging Tape
subcategories.description: Tape used for sealing packages and boxes.

subcategories.label: Masking Tape
subcategories.description: Tape used for masking off areas when painting or protecting surfaces.

subcategories.label: Reflective Tape
subcategories.description: Tape that reflects light for increased visibility.
